0.8.1.name: wordpress/guthrie
0.8.1.description: Be the author of your identity! Guthrie allows you to create and manage an online profile page. Send invitations and share your profile among all your trusted (or not so trusted) family, friends and associates, sharing only what you need with each one as you see fit. Every invitation sent contains a link to unlock your unique profile based on your relationship with them.
